704610.name: Reaching for Petals - Official Soundtrack
704610.description:
The music in Reaching for Petals, composed by Gustavo Coutinho, go hand in hand with the narration and visuals to deliver a powerful experience. In game, the music dynamically changes to fit the setting and narration. We re-formatted the music into 40 minutes of standard musical pieces for your enjoyment outside of Reaching for Petals. Take the memories of your adventures with you, and experience the musical masterpieces from each chapter.

Songs:


  • 1 - The Trees
  • 2 - Life
  • 3 - Wooden House
  • 4 - Lotus
  • 5 - The Cave
  • 6 - Fireflies (feat. Kate Miterko)
  • 7 - Test of Time
  • 8 - Momentos
  • 9 - The Woods
  • 10 - Silhouette
  • 11 - The Mountain
  • 12 - Cold
  • 13 - I Have Finally Found You (feat. Leticia Schimerski)
  • 15 - Memories of the Truth
  • 16 - Reaching for Petals
704610.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
